sentences.english: Lally was right about the repairs which the cottage needed.
sentences.chinese: 拉莉關於農舍需要如何修理的意見是正確的。

sentences.english: In March, Hareton had had an accident and been confined to the farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，哈里頓發生了一起事故，並被囚禁在了農舍。

sentences.english: Yet I wouldn’t rule out a little farmhouse should we someday choose to settle down.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我不排除有一天，我們應選擇小農舍定居下來。

sentences.english: Together, the family entered the little unpainted farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 全家人一起走進了尚未油漆的農舍。

sentences.english: Stone walled fields and farmhouses along the coast.
He rented (hired) out his farmhouse for use as a hostel in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 他在夏天把農舍短期租出作旅舍用途。

sentences.english: We put up for the night at a farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一間農舍投宿了一夜。

sentences.english: The cattle were herded into the barn by the shepherd.
sentences.chinese: 牧羊人把羊羣趕進了農舍。

sentences.english: Jimdo's origins lie in a farmhouse in Germany.
sentences.chinese: Jimdo出源自德國的一間農舍。

sentences.english: 1986 《farmhouse 》select to leave for the Canadian art exchanges exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 1986年《農舍》入選赴加拿大美術交流展。

sentences.english: Over the high banks, the cottage roofs and the tops of the bamboo clumps are visible.
sentences.chinese: 高高的河岸上，竹林梢頭農舍的屋頂隱約可見。

sentences.english: In the 18th century Aydon became a farmhouse, remaining so until 1966.
sentences.chinese: 18世紀艾登城堡成爲一間農舍，直到1966年。

sentences.english: Despite the wind and the rain, they plodded on until they reached the cottage.
sentences.chinese: 儘管頂風冒雨，他們仍艱難地走到那座農舍。

sentences.english: The barn has a linear form that reflects the local architecture of long, gabled farmhouses.
sentences.chinese: 穀倉反映了當地長型山牆農舍的直線形式。

sentences.english: Old Joe and his wife live in a cottage at the end of their farm.
sentences.chinese: 老喬和妻子住在自己農場盡頭的農舍裏。

sentences.english: Barn A is clad in corrugated metal and serves as the operations office and workspace for the farm.
sentences.chinese: 農舍A覆以摺疊金屬板，作爲農場的辦公室和工作間。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
abbr. for 違章建築|违章建筑, illegal construction
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
